post.body: I needed it for a personal blog post (send a message if you want the address) and thought you guys might get a /giggle out of it too
http://www.pinetree.net/humor/thermodynamics.html funnies for your procrastination. "Is Hell exothermic or endothermic?"
I get all three!
Just FYI? Strength of Earth totem now comes with Agility AND Strength. It's tastiness for all melee dps types!
Hahah - yes! I think Totems will get their own post, since I'd like to cover the changes to some of the non-healing totems too.
awesome - I may add Totems to that list then (especially now that they're raid wide). Or maybe totems deserve their own post.
uh oh. <gives tea and english muffin and maybe soup for lunch> feel better!
I've heard reports of 1+ inches per hour snowfall in upstate NY. Stay warm!
Hugs and good thoughts sent to you/officemates - that's rough at any time, but especially now.
Sounds like a very festive living room :D
what about a troll-like name?
what's his personality like?
what kind of cat are you naming?
hai2upike!
I met Pengu in game for the first time the other night. I was immune, until he went <chirpychittersqueak!> Now I must have one
It would be even MORE awesome if it were an angry penguin.
actually - I think that'd be interesting to see - my most common raid leaders have been DPS, least common have been healers.
@kestrelsaerie Don't make me pull this twitter over...
very. very. true. (also unfortunate. you could make millions selling a cure for stupid)
dunno, I've definitely gotten blamed for stuff that was decidedly NOT my fault as a healer. I think it's because if you have ...
not yet. I need to take a shower and not be angry before I do. Yelling at customer service reps is generally counterproductive.
so I have the bag and the mouse, but no computer. and when I picked my options, I only had ONE option - not three.
charged me 3 times for rush processing, and managed to give my mouse 2 day AIR, my bag 3 day, and the laptop 7 day ground ship.
I ordered three things and got one shipping option - picked 3 day ground. they processed it as three separate orders...
this is the first time I"ve had problems.
Happy Birthday!
cranberries are great for that kind of thing, because they have lots of pectin
<sends hugs and a heating pad> take it easy ok?
Hi Rhoelyn! yay!
a little of column A, a little of column B. but I think Twitter is not the place to reply! too few characters.
G'night all!
New Shiny Chestpiece from 25 man Sartharion. He's really kind of a loot pinata if you kill all his dargon buddies.

Boomsplat goes the server!
Listening to "Code Monkey"

RT @adders: RT @eaton: "Being a community manager is like being a piñata. People beat you with sticks, then you have to give them candy."

Really liking wordpress 2.7. Quickpress is awesome, as are the dashboard modificiations.

The Kalu'ak really need a rep tabard.
do NOT feel like cooking dinner. but going to get food will take an hour and a half.
... waaaay too much healing, you can get away with not paying attention.
Dear Family - if you want us to show up for stuff that's several hours away, we need more than one day's notice.
Too Many Annas: A Rare Link to a Blue Post http://tinyurl.com/3s7rhd
mmm. hot cocoa.
Malygos (10) defeated. Good to feel challenged, but I"m not entirely sure I'm fond of the "fighting from dragons" thing.
I have eaten black-eyed peas (in a black eyed pea/corn salsa). My mother will be happy.
Trying to start '09 off on a good foot. So far, working. Probably goign to take a few days of getting set up for (hopefully) awesome.
Too Many Annas: Snowshaman? http://tinyurl.com/8wm6nl
currently VERY annoyed at NewEgg
my new laptop should be here today! wooo!

I am having trouble responding to tweets lately. Everything I want to say takes too many words.
I hate having the hiccups.
Level 80 shaman - FINALLY - still wearing mostly tier 6 healing gear, but enough to at least do some normal 80 instances.
